name: Saving Sundarbans
description:
You are a robot programmed to eliminate illegal lumberjacks and help protect the forest from deforestation.

The more trees the enemies cut down, the more the wildlife of the forest worsens.

The game utilizes the theme by bringing awareness on importance of forests for life on earth. In this prototype, I wanted to highlight the ecosystem and wildlife of the Sundarbans, which is the largest mangrove forest in the world and located in Bangladesh.
